author: Mother Teresa
quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.

author: Charles M. Schulz
quote: I love mankind ... it's people I can't stand!!

author: Robert Frost
quote: We love the things we love for what they are.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Where there is love there is life.

author: Edgar Allen Poe
quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.

author: Trisha Yearwood
quote: What's meant to be will always find a way

author: Milan Kundera
quote: Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful.

author: George Burns
quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.

author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca
quote: When love is not madness it is not love.

author: Robert Frost
quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Hate the sin, love the sinner.

author: Charles Bukowski
quote: Find what you love and let it kill you.

author: Robert Marley
quote: One love, one heart, one destiny.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.

author: Scott Adams
quote: I love you like a fat kid loves cake!

author: Bob Marley
quote: love the life you live.live the life you love.

author: Dalai Lama XIV
quote: Love is the absence of judgment.

author: Nicholas Sparks
quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.

author: Galway Kinnell
quote: Let our scars fall in love.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Who, being loved, is poor?

author: Blaise Pascal
quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.

author: Jean de La Fontaine
quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.

author: Julio Cortázar
quote: Come sleep with me: We won't make Love, Love will make us.

author: Lauren Conrad
quote: Don't cry over someone who wouldn't cry over you.

author: Daphne du Maurier
quote: Women want love to be a novel. Men, a short story.

author: Katherine Mansfield
quote: The mind I love must have wild places.

author: Zora Neale Hurston
quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.

author: Gabriel García Márquez
quote: sex is the consolation you have when you can't have love

author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
quote: The soul is healed by being with children.

author: Jane Austen
quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.

author: Jude Deveraux
quote: Love can make even nice people do awful things.

author: Mitch Albom
quote: Love is how you stay alive, even after you are gone.

author: Brian Moore
quote: Love isn't an act, it's a whole life.

author: Pablo Neruda
quote: Let us forget with generosity those who cannot love us

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Love is something more stern and splendid than mere kindness.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: There is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.

author: Rumi Jalalud-Din
quote: Travel brings power and love back into your life.

author: Charles Dickens
quote: What greater gift than the love of a cat.

author: George MacDonald
quote: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved.

author: William Blake
quote: If a thing loves, it is infinite.

author: Doris Lessing
quote: Trust no friend without faults, and love a woman, but no angel.

author: E.E. Cummings
quote: Lovers alone wear sunlight.

author: W.H. Auden
quote: We must love one another or die

author: pablo neruda
quote: You are like nobody since I love you.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Love is a better master than duty.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: The best things in life make you sweaty.

author: Sherwood Anderson
quote: I am a lover and have not found my thing to love.

author: E.E Cummings
quote: Unless you love someone, nothing else makes sense.

author: Dorothy Parker
quote: I hate writing, I love having written.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: Deep in earth my love is lyingAnd I must weep alone.

author: Jalalu'l-din Rumi
quote: I know you're tired but come, this is the way.

author: Emily Dickinson
quote: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: We are never so defenseless against suffering as when we love.

author: Voltaire
quote: Love truth, but pardon error.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Whenever you are confronted with an opponent. Conquer him with love.

author: Diane Von Furstenberg
quote: When a woman becomes her own best friend life is easier.

author: Gabriel García Márquez
quote: nothing in this world was more difficult than love.

author: Johann wolfgang von Goethe
quote: If I love you, what business is it of yours?

author: George R.R. Martin
quote: When the sun has set, no candle can replace it.

author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky
quote: To love someone means to see them as God intended them.

author: Edgar Allen Poe
quote: And all I loved, I loved alone.

author: Jodi Picoult
quote: When you love someone you let them take care of you.

author: Hermann Hesse
quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.

author: Rumi
quote: Wherever you are, and whatever you do, be in love.

author: C.G. Jung
quote: The most terrifying thing is to accept oneself completely.

author: Bob Marley
quote: Love would never leave us alone

author: Elizabeth Gilbert
quote: The love that moves the sun and the other stars.

author: Marilyn Monroe
quote: I love to do the things the censors won't pass.

author: Nietzsche
quote: That which is done out of love is always beyond good and evil.

author: Anaïs Nin
quote: You cannot save people. You can only love them.

author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer
quote: Moving on is easy. It's staying moved on that's trickier.

author: Jess C Scott
quote: A fit, healthy body—that is the best fashion statement

author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
quote: Man is sometimes extraordinarily, passionately, in love with suffering...

author: Willa Cather
quote: Where there is great love, there are always miracles.

author: Jack Kerouac
quote: Will you love me in December as you do in May?

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: I sustain myself with the love of family.

author: Andy Warhol
quote: People should fall in love with their eyes closed.

author: Eckhart Tolle
quote: To love is to recognize yourself in another.

author: Rumi
quote: Reason is powerless in the expression of Love.

author: Thomas S. Monson
quote: Choose your love. Love your choice.

author: Antoine De Saint-Exupery
quote: True love begins when nothing is looked for in return.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Amor Fati – Love Your Fate, which is in fact your life.

author: Taylor Swift
quote: you're an expert at sorry and keeping the lines blurry

author: Jim Harrison
quote: I like grit, I like love and death, I'm tired of irony.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: I love those who can smile in trouble...

author: Nicholas Sparks
quote: Yes... it wasn't over, it still isn't over.

author: Anita Loos
quote: I've always loved high style in low company.

author: Colleen Houck
quote: You don’t take away my choices. You are my choice.

author: Gerard Way
quote: Would you destroy Something perfect in order to make it beautiful?

author: Buddha
quote: If you truly loved yourself, you could never hurt another.

author: Sara Evans
quote: Even on my weakest daysI get a little bit stronger

author: Charles Bukowski
quote: She's mad, but she's magic. There's no lie in her fire.

author: Warsan Shire
quote: With you, intimacy colours my voice.even ‘hello’ sounds like ‘come here'.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Ultimately, it is the desire, not the desired, that we love.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: If you truly love nature, you will find beauty everywhere.

author: Lenny Bruce
quote: There are never enough 'I love you's.
